author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-2070.  Added a flush method to pipes' DownwardProtocol and call that before waiting for the application to finish to ensure all buffered data is flushed. Contributed by Owen O'Malley.

author: kbennett
msg: TIKA-75: Provides a MimeUtils.getType(URL) method that will determine MIME type based on the stream and, if necessary, the name.
